name: Purple Cotton Candy
description: Purple Cotton Candy by LivWell is a calming indica-dominant hybrid strain that crosses Granddaddy Purple and Cotton Candy Kush. Once inhaled, you will notice a cotton candy flavor in the back of your throat as well as hints of lavender and skunk.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Hungry, Talkative, Stress, Depression, Lack of Appetite, Insomnia, Pain, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
